True - except there are other codes for fatalities, accidents, and trauma.
=
Code 7 means things like home, on personal time, in court, etc.

.radiolabs.com/police-codes.html

de for being out of service (short

com>

From:

hoo.com>
Subject:

 =
           
              
                Tonight at work I was talking to=
 a state trooper, there had 
                been an accident. I asked him =
if there were any deaths (it was 
                very very bad) and he sai=
d he didnt know so he got on his radio 
                and called in and a=
sked them if it was a 7 at the site. They 
                told him negativ=
e, and he told me the little boy who was the 
                worst off was=
 still alive. I asked him why did you ask them if 
                it was a=
 7. He said code 7, I was asking them if they were dead. 
                S=
o if you ever hear anyone call 7 over the radio that means 
               =
 someones dead.
                =A0
                Just thought I would pa=
ss that on. I find it interesting 
                since I know alot of us =
have heard this before when used to 
                describe who is speaki=
ng rather than a name they say 
seven.
                =A0
                =
Misty
